page.title: 10TRANSPORT (cont'd)
page.content: {ROADS}- In the area we surveyed only two garages were selling petrol _ at Blackhorse and at Wick. The{M4}motorway cuts east/west through the area with the{M4/M32}roundabout situated at Hambrook. The main link road{A4174}becomes con- gested during traffic hours. The main {A432}road runs north/south through the area from Bristol to Cirencester. {FRENCHAY BRIDGE}- was shut down due to serious damage from heavy traffic, but concrete bollards at each end of the bridge have failed to stop its use. {AIR SPACE}- One of the flight paths serving Filton Aerodrome is above Ham- brook adding to rail and road noise. {RAILWAYS}- The busy main London-South Wales line runs through the area north -west of Hambrook, carrying passengers and freight. A tall railway viaduct can be seen at Hambrook.
